title: Trying to change my email address
body:
Hi,
I'm trying to change my email address because my old email address doesn't work anymore.
When I change my account details to the new email address I get the message: "A passcode has been sent to the email address" but it's sending the passcode to my old email address which I can't access any more.

How do I update my account to my new email address?
Help please.

replies.body:
Usually, you need to still have access to your old e-mail in order to align your account to a new e-mail. Strange that you've completely lost access to your old one, as usually most domains will provide a way for you to recover your e-mail credentials.

Try making a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) instead.
